intro_screen.main_subtitle: I like to build stuff occasionally.
intro_bio: I'm currently a Sophomore attending St. Mary's University,
Majoring in Computer Science with minor in Mathematics.
I have a profound interest in machine learning, operating
systems, full-stack development, and everything in between.

section.title: ~/About
section.description: Brief information about me and some of my interests.

bio: I am currently studying computer science at St. Mary's University with a focus in computer science with a minor in mathematics. Recently, I was an undergrad research intern at the McNair Research Program of STMU, a Post-Baccalaureate Achievement Program. Some of my current goals are to build experience and to acquire meaningful connections for personal development.

I have a profound interest in numerous types of software development such as machine learning, operating systems, and especially in full-stack development. I'm a huge desk setup and PC enthusiast. In my free time, I enjoy playing/analyzing chess games, online window shopping, thrifting, and playing Minecraft multiplayer servers.

section.title: ~/Education
section.description: Courses that I have completed or am on track to complete. Current GPA: 3.24

general.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

courses.name: Intro to Data Analytics Python Programming I

section.title: ~/Experience
section.description: Positions, team projects, or organizations I am/have been a part of.

experience_items.title: Research Intern
description: Conducted thorough undergraduate research on compiler design and high-level to low-level language translation.
Developed a lightweight translator by building a parser, lexer, and semantic analyzer module to convert custom code into assembly language for a virtual machine.
Collaborated closely with mentors to refine development skills and deepen understanding of language design principles and compiler design methodologies.

experience_items.title: Web Master Intern
description: NP Engagement is a San Antonio public relations firm that I worked for that was partnered with dozens of real estate companies, resturants, and local businesses.
My responsibilities included building and designing websites using wordpress while also integrating custom API scripts for specific client needs.
Maintained and updated dozens of partered business websites and online services.
Collaborated with a team to enhance the growth of clients' businesses and traffic.

experience_items.title: Club Vice President
description: Supported the president in all aspects of club leadership, including meeting planning and execution, task delegation, and activity organization.
Managed meeting presentations and oversaw the work of other officers and club members.
Oversaw the organization's app development team where we created a Dart application to display top student favorite locations.

section.title: ~/Projects
section.description: Some of my most recent or past favorite creations or work.

project_items.description: Discord.py program that uses Hypixel & PlayerDB APIs to allow users to link and access in-game data. Simply, a versatile Hypixel Discord bot.
An e-portfolio built with React.js that utilizes GitHub API. Designed for public use and easy configuration. The second iteration of my website.
Application that showcases popular locations for college students specifically for St. Mary's students. collaborated with an 7 person team.
